Hamuduruwo udasampadawedi prathigya dunna neda thaman sasara duken midala anik ayatath sasaren nidahas wenna maga pennanawa kiyala. e prathigyawa oba wahansela dunne budunta. budunta ehema poronduwak wela sasarin nidahas wela minissuntath sasarin nidahas wenna maga penwanne nathuwa wena dewal karanne ai? replies.replyComment: Game hamuduruwo aulk tynawanm. Game minissu ekathu wela e wardda hadagnna kiynna puluwan wenna oni. Ehama natuwa nkn boruwata hama tanama kiyawala tamnge agamata lejja karawanna epa oooi. Tamn upddapu ammata lejja karnawa wage wadak eeka. Anik agam diha balala e minissunge tyana samagiya dha wath balala hadiyalla. Jathiyk widihta  ekata hitaplla. Pnasalk paththe ynna wath nathi eun eka eka katha ahala nkn type karla keybord wirayo wenna hadnna epa. Mokek hari ekak deyak kiyapuwa ow eeka hari kiynna balagena inna natuwa. Buddimathwa wada karplla.

@Wijaya Bandara hamuduruwaru deyak kiwoth tamai ubalata godak ridenna. Ara thmbi kocchra katha kiwada un kisima aulk natuwa bomabth ghla unge samuluwath lankawema tibba. Ubala rata jathiya wenuwen wachnayk hari katha karana hamudruwarunta bana bana idapplla. Ubala wageee gonnu iddi kohomada bn jathiyk widihata nagitinne.
